short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time by listening to papers anywhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Listening.com browser extension is a simple tool for saving any web page, and turning it into audio. 

You can listen to the audio in the Chrome Extension's "Listen" tab, or you can listen on your Android, iPhone, or tablet device.

Clicking the Chrome Extension's icon will pop up the Chrome Extension modal, which allows you to convert the current tab to audio. 

The converted audios are saved to your Listening.com account. Users who aren't logged in will be taken to a login or registration page.
